Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO RACING AND WAGERING
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires harness racetrack locations awarded a gaming facility license maintain live racing activity
Summary: Requires harness racetrack locations awarded a gaming facility license maintain live racing activity.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to requiring harness racetrack locations awarded a gaming facility license maintain live racing activity
